### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5)

### Lab at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (unknown)

### Electricity group at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric poles at positions (14.5, 9.5), (8.5, 6.5), (12.5, 9.5), ..., (12.5, 13.5), (15.5, 15.5), (11.5, 13.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items but lacking ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors related to power sources
- Check that all required entities, such as labs and machines, have sufficient power before attempting to use them.
